features.title: AI assessment
steps: Access AI assessment history
Launch GrowBro with reviewer credentials.
On age gate prompt choose "I am over 18".
Tap Insights -> AI Assessment.
Open the "Sample Leaf Analysis" card to view results.
Trigger guided assessment demo
From AI Assessment, tap "Run guided assessment".
Select the demo plant "Aurora Borealis".
Choose the sample gallery image to simulate capture.
Review the generated guidance summary.
notes: Demo data reset script seeds at least one completed assessment with guidance output.
Guided assessment flow requires selected demo plant and sample asset bundle.

features.title: Community feed
steps: Reach community feed
Tap Community from the bottom navigation bar.
Scroll to the "Compliance launch checklist" pinned post.
Open the actions menu to verify moderation options are visible.
Access sample report flow
Within pinned post, tap the three dot menu.
Show Report / Mute / Block options.
Cancel to return to the feed.
notes: Pinned post content is pre-moderated and safe for review screen recording.
Moderation actions remain visible even when reviewer account has read-only flag.

features.title: Reminders calendar
steps: Review scheduled reminders
Tap Calendar from navigation.
Select today's date to show the scheduled feeding task.
Open reminder details to display notification status.
Demonstrate reminder notification settings
In Calendar, tap the reminder settings icon.
Adjust default reminder lead time.
Save to confirm update and note expected push behavior.
notes: Demo reminder uses local notification stub; no push is sent until POST_NOTIFICATIONS granted.
Calendar view seeded via ci/app-access-seed.ts provisioning script.

checklist: Rotate reviewer credentials and update Play Console App access before each submission.
Run pnpm compliance:app-access to verify instructions and deep links.
Attach reviewer walkthrough PDF and this JSON to the compliance package in docs/compliance.
Confirm reviewer account is age-verified and bypass tokens remain valid.
